title: Syllabus Posted?
content: Just checking in to see if the posted has been released for this class.  Thanks!

title: Submitting HW on GitHub
content: Should we email you our github usernames/homework folder url's or do you have everyone's github account details already?

title: Confusion about controllers
content: Based on the first question. I defined a 'greet' route. I also created a 'GreetsController' since the notes say to always pluralize controllers. However, when I test things out in chrome, rails complains at me that it's looking for 'GreetController' rather than 'GreetsController.'
